attributes.action: change the Licensing Act to protect residents from problem pubs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The law currently requires that the details of anyone asking for a review of a pub have their personnal details sent to the premise license holders. In the case where the premise license holder and pub have been causing a nuisance especially by intimidation and violence this places the local residents at greater risk of harm. The law should be changed to protect personal details of residents.
